title: PlZ Help since patch 5.13 i keep on getting unspecified error occurred every time I click LOL client

replies.body:
This bug sometimes happens when you close LoL midway through an update, and I think is mainly to do with corrupted files.

I recommend repairing the LoL files by clicking the question mark help button before you log in and click repair (takes a long time).

Last resort would be to uninstall and re download LoL.
GL!

HI thank you i have tried repair and seems like it doesn't work...

so i will have to reinstall it then 

thank you for your help

No worries, let me know if this fixes the issue or not.
I have had a similar problem before where I was stuck at 33% and for me re-downloading fixed it.

GL!
